mapper.sql: select id, dept_id, project_id, temporary_code, original_code, original_sub_code, category_id, category_name, brand_id, brand_name, material_id, asset_name, specification, asset_status, production_time, location_id, location_name, managed_dept_Id, managed_dept_name, using_dept_Id, using_dept_name, managed_emp_Id, managed_emp_name, using_emp_Id, using_emp_name, collector_user_id, collector_user_name, collector_time, remark, main_image_url, main_image_name, image_url, image_url_name, match_status, print_status, delete_flag, created_by_id, created_by_name, created_time, updated_by_id, updated_by_name, updated_time from asset as a
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS collectionCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN original_code IS NOT NULL AND original_code != '' THEN 1 END) AS matchCount FROM asset where delete_flag = 0 and project_id = #{projectId}
where id = #{id} and delete_flag=0

mapper.update:
update asset
dept_id = #{deptId},
project_id = #{projectId},
temporary_code = #{temporaryCode},
original_code = #{originalCode},
original_code = null,
original_sub_code = #{originalSubCode},
original_sub_code = null,
category_id = #{categoryId},
category_name = #{categoryName},
brand_id = #{brandId},
brand_id =null ,
brand_name = #{brandName},
brand_name =null ,
material_id = #{materialId},
asset_name = #{assetName},
specification = #{specification},
production_time = #{productionTime},
asset_status = #{assetStatus},
location_id = #{locationId},
location_name = #{locationName},
managed_dept_Id = #{managedDeptId},
managed_dept_name = #{managedDeptName},
using_dept_Id = #{usingDeptId},
using_dept_name = #{usingDeptName},
managed_emp_Id = #{managedEmpId},
managed_emp_name = #{managedEmpName},
using_emp_Id = #{usingEmpId},
using_emp_name = #{usingEmpName},
collector_user_id = #{collectorUserId},
collector_user_name = #{collectorUserName},
collector_time = #{collectorTime},
remark = #{remark},
main_image_url = #{mainImageUrl}, main_image_name = #{mainImageName}, image_url =#{imageUrl}, image_url_name =#{imageUrlName},
match_status = #{matchStatus},
print_status = #{printStatus},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag},
created_by_id = #{createdById},
created_by_name = #{createdByName},
created_time = #{createdTime},
updated_by_id = #{updatedById},
updated_by_name = #{updatedByName},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from asset where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
select mainData.dimensionId, user.nick_name as dimensionName, mainData.dimensionCount from ( select a.collector_user_id as dimensionId, count(1) as dimensionCount from asset as a where a.delete_flag = 0 and a.project_id=#{projectId}
AND date_format(a.collector_time,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND date_format(a.collector_time,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
group by a.collector_user_id ) as mainData inner join sys_user as user on mainData.dimensionId = user.user_id order by user.user_name

select mainData.dimensionId, d.department_name as dimensionName, mainData.dimensionCount from ( select a.using_dept_Id as dimensionId, count(1) as dimensionCount from asset as a where a.delete_flag = 0 and a.project_id=#{projectId}
AND date_format(a.collector_time,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND date_format(a.collector_time,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
group by a.using_dept_Id ) as mainData inner join department as d on mainData.dimensionId = d.id order by d.department_name

select mainData.dimensionId, l.location_name as dimensionName, mainData.dimensionCount from ( select a.location_id as dimensionId, count(1) as dimensionCount from asset as a where a.delete_flag = 0 and a.project_id=#{projectId}
AND date_format(a.collector_time,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND date_format(a.collector_time,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
group by a.location_id ) as mainData inner join location as l on mainData.dimensionId = l.id order by l.location_name
